description.narrative: Component 1: Strengthened sector policy, legal framework & planning ? To ensure a coherent sector wide policy and planning framework with clear and feasible targets there will be two additional support staff provided to TCM-CU to assist with development and monitoring and evaluation mechanisms, as well as to ensure timely financial and procurement activities, procurement of programme vehicles to assist with monitoring and site assessments, and implementation of the industrial policy which is being developed under Tier One. ? Correct and updated statistics to measure the performance of the TCM sector plan will be produced through the procurement of information technology (IT) equipment based on the recommendations from the national technical assistant(TA) to be recruited through the Tier One project. The TA to be provided under Tier One will document/scope existing databases and consolidate them into a central database for monitoring sector performance. Following the establishment of a

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Labour
